name.ch: 學務處學期實習課程(一)

remark.ch: 教室:學務處二樓交誼廳。1.學生所屬系所未於當學期開實習課;2.學生已錄取實習並於規定期間進行實習;3.學生須於規定期限前繳交申請表及用印完成之合約書於職涯發展中心，經審核通過後核發密碼卡

goal.en: Through the external internship experience, students can enhance their ability to apply what they have learned and develop soft skills for the workplace outside of their profession.
goal.ch: 透過校外實習的經驗提升同學學以致用的能力，並鍛鍊專業以外之職場軟實力。

content.en: The supervisor of the internship company will plan the learning contents during the internship, and our counselor will take care of the students‘ performance during the internship.
content.ch: 由實習企業之導師規劃實習期間之學習內容，並由本校輔導老師關懷學生之實習表現。

grading.en: Corporate Instructor Rating 70％ School instructor Rating of 30％
grading.ch: 企業導師評分 70％ 校內老師評分 30％
